Package sailingclub.client.gui.controllers

Class EmployeeGuiController

java.lang.Object
sailingclub.client.gui.controllers.EmployeeGuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class EmployeeGuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Is the controller for the Employee gui, contains all the handlers that manage all the javafx components
